subdisciplines.name: Behavioral Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how behavior is influenced by brain structures and functions.

subdisciplines.name: Clinical Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The assessment and treatment of cognitive and behavioral problems caused by brain injury or disease.

subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how cognitive processes are related to specific brain structures and functions.

subdisciplines.name: Developmental Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of cognitive development and how the brain changes during development.

subdisciplines.name: Experimental Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of cognitive processes and brain structures using experimental methods.

subdisciplines.name: Neuropsychological Rehabilitation
subdisciplines.description: The development and implementation of interventions to improve cognitive and behavioral functioning following brain injury or disease.

subdisciplines.name: Clinical Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The assessment and treatment of cognitive and behavioral problems resulting from brain injury or neurological illness.

subdisciplines.name: Experimental Neuropsychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between brain function and behavior by manipulating or measuring brain activity.
